mapper.select: SELECT t.deptName,t.ordersByIn, t.useTimesByIn, t.amountByIn, t.ordersByOut, t.useTimesByOut, t.amountByOut, t.ordersByOut+t.ordersByIn as orders,t.useTimesByOut + t.useTimesByIn as useTimes, t.amountByOut + t.amountByIn as amount from ( (SELECT deptId,deptName,ordersByIn,useTimesByIn,amountByIn,IFNULL(ordersByOut,0) as ordersByOut,IFNULL(useTimesByOut,0) as useTimesByOut,IFNULL(amountByOut,0) as amountByOut from ( select eo.dept_id deptId, eo.dept_name deptName, osti.state state, count(oi.order_id) ordersByIn, sum(ji.use_time) useTimesByIn, sum(osi.amount) amountByIn from order_info oi left join (SELECT state,order_id FROM `order_state_trace_info` where trace_id in (select max(trace_id) from order_state_trace_info GROUP BY order_id) ) osti on osti.order_id=oi.order_id LEFT JOIN journey_info ji ON oi.journey_id = ji.journey_id LEFT JOIN order_settling_info osi ON osi.order_id = oi.order_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_user eu ON eu.user_id = oi.user_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_org eo ON eo.dept_id = eu.dept_id LEFT JOIN car_group_driver_relation cgdr ON cgdr.driver_id = oi.driver_id LEFT JOIN car_group_info cgi ON cgi.car_group_id = cgdr.car_group_id where osti.state in ('S900','S901') and cgi.it_is_inner = 'C000' and ji.end_date >= #{startDate} and ji.end_date <= #{endDate} group by eo.dept_id ) i LEFT JOIN ( select eo.dept_name deptNameOut, osti.state stateOut, count(oi.order_id) ordersByOut, sum(ji.use_time) useTimesByOut, sum(osi.amount) amountByOut from order_info oi left join (SELECT state,order_id FROM `order_state_trace_info` where trace_id in (select max(trace_id) from order_state_trace_info GROUP BY order_id) ) osti on osti.order_id=oi.order_id LEFT JOIN journey_info ji ON oi.journey_id = ji.journey_id LEFT JOIN order_settling_info osi ON osi.order_id = oi.order_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_user eu ON eu.user_id = oi.user_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_org eo ON eo.dept_id = eu.dept_id LEFT JOIN car_group_driver_relation cgdr ON cgdr.driver_id = oi.driver_id LEFT JOIN car_group_info cgi ON cgi.car_group_id = cgdr.car_group_id where osti.state in ('S900','S901') and cgi.it_is_inner = 'C111' and ji.end_date >= #{startDate} and ji.end_date <= #{endDate} group by eo.dept_id ) o on i.deptName = o.deptNameOut ) ) t
